snippet.title: Forklift Driving Simulator VR  [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
Forklift Driving Simulator VR is a VR simulation game developed by Twin Software Studio. Players will navigate realistic warehouse environments using five different vehicles, including a forklift, pallet trucks, reach trucks, and VNA trucks, with the objective of precise pallet handling. Engage in Levels Mode and Free - room Mode, mastering the most challenging warehouse operations. Forklift Driving Simulator VR launches in March for Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest Pro, and Steam.

Oculus Store: 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3450710/Forklift_Driving_Simulator_VR/

Oculus Store Demo: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6253127401406257/

Twin Software Studio: https://linktr.ee/Twin_Software_Studio

Music from #InAudio: https://inaudio.org/ 
MokkaMusic - Run Faster

Music: Mokka - No Copyright Music
https://youtu.be/GwXeE09zxG4

Track: Sport Trailer Rock [Rock Music] by MokkaMusic / Run Faster   https://youtu.be/GwXeE09zxG4
Music provided by "MokkaMusic" channel and https://inaudio.org

#ForkliftDrivingSimulatorVR #TSS #TwinSoftwareStudio #Simulator #Game #Forklift #VR #Oculus #OculusQuest #OculusQuest3 #Unity #Unity3d
